channel.title: nodejs on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in nodejs on Mark Needham

item.title: Node.js: Minifying JSON documents
item.description: I often need to minimise the schema and table config files that you use to configure Apache Pinot so that they donâ€™t take up so much space. After doing this manually for ages, I came across the json-stringify-pretty-compact library, which speeds up the process. We can install it like this: npm install json-stringify-pretty-compact And then I have the following script: minify.mjs import pretty from 'json-stringify-pretty-compact'; let inputData = ''; process.

item.title: XP Day: Visualizing what's happening on our project
item.description: Another presentation that I gave at XP Day was one covering some visualisations Liz, Uday and I have created from various data we have about our project, gathered from Git, Go and Mingle. Visualisations These were some of the things that I learned from doing the presentation: The various graphs I presented in the talk have a resolution of 1680 x 1050 which is a much higher resolution than what was available on the projector.
